pages.text: $(li)The Frostmancer is a powerful mage who has specialized in the ice element.$(br)$(li)It is able to pull in their enemies, slow their movement speed and even summon ice blocks on top of them that once they fall they deal a lot of damage.$(br)$(li)The Frostmancer can be found in the $(l:patchouli:illagers/ice_castle)Ice Castle$(/l).

On death they may drop $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/snow)Snow Blocks$(/l), $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/ice)Ice$(/l), Blue Ice, $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/snowball)Snowballs$(/l), $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/diamond)Diamonds$(/l), and a $(l:patchouli:tools/vanilla/totem_of_undying)Totem of Undying$(/l).
